ModMetaData.name: Core SK - Expanded Roofing
ModMetaData.author: NigrumMortis (supporting 1.4) & KiameV (supporting until 1.3) & Why_is_that (original)
ModMetaData.description: Adds customizable roofing, with transparent greenhouse roofing and photovoltaic solar roofing. Reworked from Vendan's original idea.
